name: Stray Kitten and the Magical Lantern
name_original: Stray Kitten and the Magical Lantern
description:
In a small town near the edge of the woods, there once was a pair of siblings, who would one day disappear into those very woods. But this is not their story…

In this game you play as "Stray" the kitten, who runs after a pair of siblings into the woods. Traverse the woods to reach them, but be careful as the woods are more dangerous than you might think. Stray Kitten and the Magical Lantern is an adventure game that tests your reflexes.

There are three different endings in total.
